statements: SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalProducts WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM PharmaceuticalProducts WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM PharmaceuticalProducts ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalProducts WHERE quantity <= 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PharmaceuticalProducts;
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalProducts WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM PharmaceuticalProducts WHERE expiry_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM PharmaceuticalProducts WHERE quantity < 50 AND expiry_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalProducts WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR expiry_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM PharmaceuticalProducts WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT expiry_date FROM ExpiryDates WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM Inventory WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT i.product_name, e.expiry_date FROM Inventory i INNER JOIN ExpiryDates e ON i.product_id = e.product_id
SELECT * FROM ExpiryDates WHERE expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM ProductCategories WHERE category_id = 3
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM InventoryLogs
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND expiry_date > '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50 AND product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY expiry_date ASC
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM ProductCategories JOIN Inventory ON ProductCategories.category_id = Inventory.product_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_products > 3
SELECT log_id, action_type, updated_at FROM InventoryLogs WHERE action_type = 'ADD' ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale';
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM products WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 AND quantity < 50;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-09-30';
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.product_id, t.transaction_type, t.transaction_date, p.product_name FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'Sale';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, warehouse_name, quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON w.warehouse_id = i.warehouse_id;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
